3. City Council

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 6 p.m.
* Second and fourth Mondays of each month

Agendas, Minutes, Notices & Annual Reports
------------------------------------------

Agendas and notices are available prior to the meetings, and minutes are available following approval. Annual reports are released each year.

[Agendas and Minutes](http://www.mccinnovations.com/weblink/) | [Annual Reports](https://www.cityofcorsicana.com/Archive.aspx?AMID=37) | [Notices](https://www.cityofcorsicana.com/AgendaCenter/City-Council-1)

Members
-------

### Mayor Hill Oct 2025
